resources.string: Dear friend! We are very glad that you joined our application 4 photos 1 word! Find the word which is hidden in the photos and fill the answer field. Good luck!

Dear friend! At this time you have completed all game levels! New levels will be added with new application updates, so do not part with us! Also you can start new game through the "Current level" text field in the upper part of the screen.

All the support for the BibleGameDev projects is voluntary and free of charge. To support us with your donations, you can transfer to Yandex.Money account: 410015425804928 or write us. If you wish, you can indicate your name or initials in the donation message. Thank you for your help! With your help, our new projects will be better!

Dear friends! You can always support us: by placing 5 stars for this App in Play Market store, praying for people\'s interest in Bible study, telling friends about this application, helping us with voluntary donations. Thank you for your support!
Do you have questions or suggestions?
(here will be noted who support us)
